assetProfile.address2: 2nd Floor No. 1188, Lianhang Road Minhang District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Heilongjiang Interchina Water Treatment Co.,Ltd engages in the construction and operation of water treatment and other related projects in China. It also offers sewage and drainage treatment, tap water supply, and environmental protection engineering and technical services; investment, management, and related services for water and environmental protection projects; project and investment management services; energy saving and environmental protection technology development and services; technical consultation, and technology exchange and transfer services; engineering design and consulting, and environmental engineering consulting services; and agricultural machinery and production trusteeship services. In addition, the company engages in the installation and construction of water supply and drainage projects; sale of equipment and accessories; operation of environmental pollution control facilities; development of environmental equipment; import and export of goods and technologies; and provision of general cargo warehousing services. Further, it is involved in sale of agricultural and sideline products, livestock, agricultural machinery, grains, beans and potatoes, cotton and hemps, and pre-packaged health foods; leasing of agricultural machinery; agricultural scientific research and experimental development services; purchase of primary agricultural products; primary processing of edible agricultural products; grain, beans, potato, and cotton planting services; purchase of food, aquatic, livestock and poultry, and cotton products; and retailing of aquatic products. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jianlong  Zhuang
